sources.title: 1953 - Pickup on South Street - Manos peligrosas - Samuel Fuller - VOSE
Pickup on South Street
sources.description: Title: Pickup on South Street Summary: A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for enemy agents and becomes a target for a Communist spy ring. Directed by: Samuel Fuller Actors: Richard Widmark, Jean Peters, Thelma Ritter Production Company: Twentieth Century Fox Release Date: 1 August 1953 (Japan) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 On a crowded subway, Skip McCoy picks the purse of Candy. Among his take, although he does not know it at the time, is a piece of top-secret microfilm that was being passed by Candy's consort, a Communist agent. Candy discovers the whereabouts of the film through Moe Williams, a police informer. She attempts to seduce McCoy to recover the film. She fails to get back the film and falls in love with him. The desperate agent exterminates Moe and savagely beats Candy. McCoy, now goaded into action, confronts the agent in a particularly brutal fight in a subway.

sources.title: Pickup On South Street (1953)
sources.description: ANJO DO MAL  (  Pickup on South Street , 1953 - USA ) ( Filme Completo / Legendado em Português ) Data de Lançamento: 17 de Junho de 1953 » SOBRE O FILME: O ladrão Skip McCoy rouba a bolsa de uma mulher no metrô, sem saber que dentro dela está um microfilme com segredos de governo. Ele passa, então, a ser perseguido pela vítima do roubo e por agentes. . Década de 1950. Estamos em plena efervescência do período histórico que ficou conhecido como Guerra Fria, onde o mundo ficou polarizado pelas tensões do conflito entre capitalismo versus comunismo, capitaneados pelas potências EUA e a então URSS. . Nos Estados Unidos, campanhas patrióticas e anticomunistas (como o macartismo, a famosa caça as bruxas) colocavam vários artistas em uma famigerada lista negra. O então relativamente novo Samuel Fuller, com 41 anos e em seu sexto filme como diretor, ousou fazer uma obra-prima noir sobre o tema, com teor crítico, sem maniqueísmos e sem apelar para patriotadas. O fascinante Anjo do Mal (Pickup on South Street), de 1953. » » DIREÇÃO: Samuel Fuller GÊNERO: Crime, Filme Noir, Thriller ORIGEM: USA DURAÇÃO: 1h 20min » » ELENCO PRINCIPAL: Richard Widmark ... Skip McCoy Jean Peters ... Candy Thelma Ritter ... Moe Williams Murvyn Vye ... Police Captain Dan Tiger Richard Kiley ... Joey

sources.title: Pickup on South Street (1953)
sources.description: In New York City, an insolent pickpocket, Skip McCoy, inadvertently sets off a chain of events when he targets ex-prostitute Candy and steals her wallet. Unaware that she has been making deliveries of highly classified information to the communists, Candy, who has been trailed by FBI agents for months in hopes of nabbing the spy ringleader, is sent by her ex-boyfriend, Joey, to find Skip and retrieve the valuable microfilm he now holds. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/pickup-on-south-street-1953/

sources.title: Pickup On South Street (1953) Richard Widmark, Jean Peters - Film Noir
sources.description: Pickup on South Street is a 1953 Cold War spy film noir written and directed by Samuel Fuller. The film stars Richard Widmark, Jean Peters, and Thelma Ritter. In 2018, Pickup on South Street was selected for preservation in the United States National Film Registry as being "culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant.". Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pickup_on_South_Street Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/2tLevkl The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.
